var data = [];
for (var key in keywords) {
    data.push({
        name: key,
        value: Math.sqrt(keywords[key])
    })
}
 
 /*var treeUrl = "data:image/png;base64,";*/
var treeUrl = '/asset/get/s/data-1478056468744-rkpz90Iex.png';

 var maskImage = new Image();
  maskImage.src = treeUrl;
 maskImage.onload = function() {
     myChart.setOption({
         tooltip: {
             show: false
         },
         series: [{
             type: 'wordCloud',
             gridSize: 0, //词云间隔大小
             sizeRange: [10, 65],//词云大小范围
             rotationRange: [1, 100],//词云倾斜旋转范围
             rotationStep: 10,
             maskImage: maskImage,
             textStyle: {
                 normal: {
                     color: function(v) {
                         if (v.value > 600) {
                             return 'rgb(0, 116, 111)';
                         } else if (v.value > 200) {
                             return 'rgb(0, 156, 147)';
                         } else if (v.value > 9) {
                             return 'rgb(70, 209, 133)';
                         } else {
                             return 'rgb(20, 186, 167)';
                         }
                     }
                 }
             },
             width: 600, //词云图宽度
             height: 500, //词云图高度
             top: 10, //词云图距容器顶部偏移
             data: data
         }],
        
     });
 };
